title: Add Ecosystem Discovery CLI Tool
deliverables: CLI tool that queries capability registry and returns matching repos by capability name
Service discovery API supporting fuzzy search across all registered SAP-001 capabilities
Automated registry validation ensuring all repos have valid capability declarations
Integration tests verifying discovery across minimum 3 test repositories
Documentation with usage examples for finding repos by capability type
Performance benchmark supporting sub-second queries across 50+ registered repos
GitHub Action workflow for automatic registry updates on capability changes
Migration guide for converting existing manual discovery workflows to automated CLI
acceptance_criteria: CLI tool discovers repos by querying ≥3 capability types from registry files
Discovery completes in <5 seconds for ecosystem of 20 repos
Tool outputs structured JSON with repo name, capabilities, and contact info
Command supports filtering by capability tags with ≥90% accuracy
Documentation includes 3+ usage examples for common discovery scenarios
Tool validates registry YAML format and reports errors with line numbers
Integration test suite covers ≥5 discovery scenarios with 100% pass rate
CLI returns helpful error messages for 404/network failures within 2 seconds

context.background: Currently discovery is manual via capability registry YAML files. Repos must manually grep or search to find who provides specific capabilities. This doesn't scale beyond 5-10 repos.
context.rationale: Enable seamless repo discovery for coordination. Support the vision of 20+ repo ecosystem where agents can automatically find the right repo to coordinate with. Reduce friction in cross-repo collaboration.
